name: VKRM Ventures
overview: VKRM is a boutique early stage venture capital firm committed to supporting entrepreneurs to build innovative and industry leading businesses. VKRM was founded in 2007. VKRM has invested in more than 20 companies since inception with a primary focus on investments in Enterprise Services and Software, Education and Internet sectors. They proactively focus across all their core markets and aim to back the most promising companies independent of stage of business maturity. Their firm makes long-term commitments, as a growth investor, providing strategic and operational guidance to help existing management teams build world class businesses.
